fields.original_string: private DenseMatrix mat = new DenseMatrix(2, 3, new double[]{1, 4, 2, 5, 3, 6});
private DenseVector dv1 = new DenseVector(new double[]{1, 2});
private DenseVector dv2 = new DenseVector(new double[]{1, 2, 3});
private SparseVector spv1 = new SparseVector(2, new int[]{0, 1}, new double[]{1, 2});
fields.declarator: spv1 = new SparseVector(2, new int[]{0, 1}, new double[]{1, 2})

fields.original_string: private SparseVector spv2 = new SparseVector(3, new int[]{0, 2}, new double[]{1, 3});
fields.declarator: spv2 = new SparseVector(3, new int[]{0, 2}, new double[]{1, 3})
